cospar.pl.fate_coupling_from_clones¶

cospar.pl.fate_coupling_from_clones(adata, plot_time_point, selected_fates=[], color_bar=True, rename_selected_fates=[])¶

Plot fate coupling determined by just clones.

We select one time point with clonal measurement, and show the normalized clonal correlation among these fates.

Parameters
adata : AnnData object

plot_time_point : str

Time point to select the cell states.

selected_fates : list, optional (default: all)

List of fate clusters to use. If set to be [], use all.

color_bar : bool, optional (default: True)

Plot color bar.
